p.strong: EXTENDED SCHOOL CLOSURE: All FPCS buildings are closed for the remainder of the school year due to the COVID-19 global health crisis. Home-based learning continues through June 11, 2020.

a.h2: April 20, 2020 Regular Board Meeting to be Streamed Live on YouTube

div.p: Reminder: Upcoming Board of Education Meeting Recent changes to Ohio law through the passage of House Bill 197 in response to the COVID-19 public health crisis allow us to conduct our board meetings remotely. Our previously scheduled April 7 Special Board Meeting will be conducted …

a.h2: Mr. Matt Krivak to serve as Gilles-Sweet Elementary’s next Principal

div.p: Fairview Park City Schools Superintendent Dr. Bill Wagner will make a recommendation to the Board of Education at the Regular Board Meeting on Monday, April 20, 2020 that Mr. Matthew Krivak be appointed the next Principal of Gilles-Sweet Elementary, beginning August 1. Mr. Krivak has …

a.h2: Grab & Go School Meals: April Schedule

div.p: School Meals during Extended School Closure The Fairview Park City School District is providing meals during the extended school closure for families who rely on free or reduced-cost meals for their children. We will continue to offer no-cost, grab-and-go meals (each student will receive 5 …

If your child will be 5 years-old by August 1, 2020, they are eligible to enroll in Kindergarten in the Fairview Park City School District. Beginning March 2, 2020, parents/guardians should go online to www.fairviewparkschools.org/kindergarten and register their child. If you complete the full registration process …

em.span: Our Vision: We are a community united, empowering each other to learn differently, care deeply, and aspire to excellence.

div.p: We will provide our students with the Fairview Advantage, a framework for student success, by delivering exceptional services and academic programs that challenge the mind and instill the joy of learning and responsible citizenship.
